extDescription.message: üí≤ Dark theme, offers auto-boosting, accurate price and other improvements for the FunPay marketplace

resetSettingsConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset settings?

settingCustomNotificationDesc.message: Replaces the loud chat notification sound with the notification sound from VK.

settingExactPriceDesc.message: Adds fields to the lot editing window for entering the price displayed for both the seller and the buyer.

settingOfferAutoRaiseDesc.message: Automatically raises all your lots. Do not close your browser to work.

settingsHideBalanceDesc.message: It can be useful when you need to share the screen, but do not want to show the account balance.
